description: How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally! How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week, we're joined by Will Hurley, also known as Whurley, CEO of Honest Dollar.
title: Silicon Tally: SXSW Edition
teaser: How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?
